name: What Happened to Air Transat's 737s?
description:
Air Transat is one of the largest airlines here in Canada, and operates an all-Airbus fleet. All-Airbus that is, except for a single Boeing 737-800 that’s still registered to them, as of early April 2022.

So why did Air Transat fly 737-800s for just seven years, and what’s the deal with this one plane?

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
